eu.wauz.wauzcore.items

Class WauzSigns

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.items.WauzSigns

  • public class WauzSigns
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for handling the usage of event signs.
    Author:
    Wauzmons

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static void create(org.bukkit.event.block.SignChangeEvent event)
        Tries to format a sign, to be a special event sign, if the valid keywords were found. List of valid formats, were --- stands for empty rows:

        --------------------
        [Leave]
        --------------------
        --------------------

        --------------------
        [Locked Door]
        Key: KeyName
        --------------------

        --------------------
        [Fast Travel]
        StationName
        --------------------
        Parameters:
        event - The sign event.

      • interact

        public static void interact(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                            org.bukkit.block.Block block)
        Checks the sign content for keywords, to may trigger an event for the player.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who interacted with the sign.
        block - The sign block.
        See Also:
        WauzTeleporter.exitInstanceTeleportManual(Player), tryToOpenDoor(Player, Sign), tryToTravel(Player, Sign)

      • tryToOpenDoor

        private static void tryToOpenDoor(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                  org.bukkit.block.Sign sign)
        Tries to open a door, based on the key name on a sign.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who is opening the door.
        sign - The sign that is placed on the door.
        See Also:
        InstanceConfigurator.getInstanceKeyStatus(org.bukkit.World, String), InstanceConfigurator.setInstanceWorldKeyStatus(org.bukkit.World, String, String)

      • tryToTravel

        private static void tryToTravel(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                org.bukkit.block.Sign sign)
        Tries to travel to a station, based on the station name on a sign.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who wants to travel.
        sign - The sign at the current travel station.
        See Also:
        RegionConfigurator.getStationCoordinateString(String), startTravelling(Player, String, String, String)

      • startTravelling

        public static boolean startTravelling(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                      java.lang.String xString,
                                      java.lang.String yString,
                                      java.lang.String zString)
        Strats travelling to the destined location, on the MythicMob called "TravelPhantom". Checks regularely afterwards, if the target is reached.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that is travelling.
        xString - The x coordinate of the destined location.
        yString - The y coordinate of the destined location.
        zString - The z coordinate of the destined location.
        Returns:
        If the travel was successffully started.
        See Also:
        BukkitAPIHelper.spawnMythicMob(String, Location), atTravelDestination(Entity, Location)

      • atTravelDestination

        private static void atTravelDestination(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity,
                                        org.bukkit.Location targetLocation)
        Checks if the entity reached the travel destination. If the entity reached the destination or don't has any players on it, it unmounts all entities and despawns. If not it spawns some particles and rechecks in 0,5 seconds.
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity that is moving towards the destination.
        targetLocation - The destined location.
        See Also:
        atTravelCoordinate(double, double, double), hasPlayerMounted(Entity), ParticleSpawner.spawnParticleHelix(Location, SkillParticle, double, double)

      • atTravelCoordinate

        private static boolean atTravelCoordinate(double coord1,
                                          double coord2,
                                          double maxDiff)
        Checks if the given y coordinate has been reached.
        Parameters:
        coord1 - The current y coordinate.
        coord2 - The target y coordinate.
        maxDiff - The maximum difference between coordinates.
        Returns:
        If the coordinates has been reached.

      • hasPlayerMounted

        public static boolean hasPlayerMounted(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity)
        Checks if a player is in the given list of passengers.
        Parameters:
        entity - The vehicle, that holds the passengers.
        Returns:
        If a player is mounted.
